issue.summary: Chrom 19 Pre-Telomere Gap
issue.status_text: We are currently reviewing alignments in the region.
issue.description: Chromosome 19 sequence does not extend into p telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 148137 (C19orf55), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: AC002398.1 has an insertion compared to NM_001039887.2 ('G' is inserted between nts 1265 and 1266 of NM_001039887.2)
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF495725.1 has been added to GRCh38, correcting the indel in AC002398.1 and improving the alignment of C19orf55 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Chr. 19 CHORI-17 Pathway: FCGBP (Gene ID: 8857)
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC006950.1 - AC007842.1 region of Chr. 19. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: Chr. 19 CHORI-17 Pathway: CGB gene family may have missing copies in the Reference
issue.description: A clone has been selected for sequencing to possibly identify members of the CGB gene family that may have missing copies in the Reference (NC_000019.9)
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: Chr. 19 CHORI-17 Pathway: Currently, there isn't a CHORI-17 haplotypic representation of LILR and KIR genes of the leukocyte receptor complex (LRC) in the Reference
issue.description: Currently, there isn't a CHORI-17 haplotypic representation of LILR and KIR genes of the leukocyte receptor complex (LRC) on Chr. 19 in the Reference
issue.resolution_text: The complete CHORI-17 TPF representing the LILR and KIR genes of the LRC region is now sequenced and placed in the Chrom. 19 TPF and the patches TPF.

issue.summary: GeneID: 90378 (SAMD1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: Looking to see if we can obtain Miseq data for another clone here.
issue.description: reference assembly has a deletion as compared with NM_138352.1
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AC020922.9 has an extra 24bp within exon 9 of FAM71E2 compared with the transcriptional support
issue.description: BAC AC020922.9 has an extra 24bp within exon 9 of FAM71E2 compared with the transcriptional support
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573705.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC020922.9 and improving the alignment of FAM71E2 to the Reference.

issue.summary: LRC alternative haplotypes for chromosome 19 need representing within the GRC (LRC_i)
issue.description: The human Leucocyte Receptor Complex (LRC) is located on chromosome 19 in a region spanning approximately 1 Mb. DNA sequence data has been created from eight distinct LRC haplotypes and these haplotypes will be represented within the GRC as alternative loci. t LRC haplotypes and these haplotypes will be represented within the GRC as alternative loci. This ticket contains comments referring to haplotypes LRC_i, LRC_j, LRC_s and LRC_t, but it is associated specifically with the NOVEL patch for haplotype LRC_i.
issue.resolution_text: Four alternative haplotypes for this region which spans approximately 1Mb are represented. These haplotypes are the Leococyte Receptor Complex (LRC) regions LRC_i, LRC_j, LRC_s and LRC_t. This issue specifically addresses LRC_i: GL949748.1.

issue.summary: GeneID: 5676 (PSG7), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_002783.2 has two mismatches vs. the reference genome
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF454892.2 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC093055.3 and improving the alignment of PSG7 to the Reference.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC008463.7 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383573.1 created to capture sequence from AC008463.7 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC008463.7, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing 6471bp more than Reference components AC008739.5 and AC008739.5, has been uploaded to the Chr. 19 Alt-Ref-Loci_1 TPF

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC210437.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383574.1 created to capture sequence from AC210437.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC210437.3, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing 7169bp more than Reference component AC010614.8, has been uploaded to the Chr. 19 Alt-Ref-Loci_1 TPF

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC226770.1 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383575.1 created to capture sequence from AC226770.1 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC226770.1 represents a sequence variant containing approximately 9.5 kb of sequence not found in GRCh37 and it has been added to the chr 19 (alt_ref_loci_1) TPF.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC212997.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383576.1 created to capture sequence from AC212997.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC212997.3, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing 8.2kb more than Reference component AC073539.3, has been uploaded to the Chr. 19 Alt-Ref-Loci_1 TPF

issue.summary: GeneID: 57126 (CD177), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_020406.2 has a mismatch with Reference component AC005392.2 which results in a premature stop codon in the genomic sequence (nt 829 of the NM, nt 43,865,321 of chr 19).
issue.resolution_text: AMYH02036160.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC005392.2 and improving the alignment of CD177 to the Reference.

issue.summary: LRC alternative haplotypes for chromosome 19 need representing within the GRC (COX1)
issue.description: The human Leucocyte Receptor Complex (LRC) is located on chromosome 19 in a region spanning approximately 1 Mb. DNA sequence data has been created from eight distinct LRC haplotypes and these haplotypes will be represented within the GRC as alternative loci. This ticket contains comments referring to haplotypes COX_1, COX_2, PGF_1 and PGF_2, but it is associated specifically with the NOVEL patch for haplotype COX_1.
issue.resolution_text: Four alternative haplotypes for this region which spans approximately 1Mb are represented. These haplotypes are the Leococyte Receptor Complex (LRC) regions COX_1, COX_2, PGF_1 and PGF_2. This issue specifically addresses COX1: GL949746.1.

issue.summary: GeneID: 100130827 (SGK110), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: The Reference Assembly contains a possible deletion at position NC_000019.9:56052338 (AC008735.9:135375).
issue.resolution_text: KF459708.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC008735.9 and correcting the alignment of SGK110 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Update gap size method ALIGNMENT on LRC alt loci TPFs
issue.description: Update gaps on LRC alt loci TPFs with method=ALIGNMENT in preparation for AGP2.0.
issue.resolution_text: The sizing methods for the LRC gaps on the alt loci have now been updated to use ALIGNMENT as their method of determination.

issue.summary: Chr. 19 CHORI-17 Pathway: CEACAM gene family
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC011526.7 - AC022515.5 region of Chr. 19. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: The CHORI-17 TPF has been uploaded to the Chromosome 19 TPF and the Chromosome 19 patches TPF.

issue.summary: Chr. 19 CHORI-17 Pathway
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC138473.1 - AC092066.4 region of Chr. 19. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: The CH17 pathway in this region has been approved by RefSeq and uploaded to the Chr. 19 TPF.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP4F2 is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP4F2 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459709.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC004791.1 and improving the alignment of CYP4F2 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP2A6 is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP2A6 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459705.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC008537.5 and improving the alignment of CYP2A6 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP2S1 is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP2S1 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459710.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC011510.7 and improving the alignment of CYP2S1 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Reference component AC016629.7 (q-arm) of NCBI Build36 does not contain telomeric repeat.
issue.description: Reference component AC016629.7 (q-arm) of NCBI Build36 does not contain telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: AP006325.2 has been added to the TPF and extends off of AC016629.7 into the telomere.

issue.summary: LRC alternative haplotypes for chromosome 19 need representing within the GRC (LRC_j)
issue.description: The human Leucocyte Receptor Complex (LRC) is located on chromosome 19 in a region spanning approximately 1 Mb. DNA sequence data has been created from eight distinct LRC haplotypes and these haplotypes will be represented within the GRC as alternative loci. This ticket will deal with the haplotype LRC_j.
issue.resolution_text: Four alternative haplotypes for this region which spans approximately 1Mb are now represented. These haplotypes are the Leococyte Receptor Complex (LRC) regions LRC_i, LRC_j, LRC_s and LRC_t. This issue specifically addresses LRC_j: GL949749.1

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Gene structure question
issue.description: What is the gene structure of INSL3?
issue.resolution_text: User was sent information about NCBI Gene database record for INSL3 and how to view it's Gene Table.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7138 (TNNT1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_003283.4, nt 884 has the G allele while the genome has the rare T allele (NC_000019.9:55644325).
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459706.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC010327.8 and improving the alignment of TNNT1 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Should the mixed haplotype of the leukocyte receptor complex (LRC) in GRCh37 be retained as a NOVEL patch?
issue.description: Should the mixed haplotype of the leukocyte receptor complex (LRC) in GRCh37 be retained as a NOVEL patch?
issue.resolution_text: The GRCh37 representation of the LRC/KIR region has been uploaded to the Chr. 19 ALT_REF_LOCI_9 TPF for inclusion in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Gene ID: 7137 (TNNI3) - Rare/Wrong base reported by a Clinical lab
issue.description: A clinical lab reports that the GRCh37 reference base at NC_000019.9:55665584 (rs7252610) is never seen in any of their patient samples and it is never seen in the 1000G cohort. This SNP is located in the TNNI3 gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459707.1 has been added to GRCh38, updating the base at rs7252610 in assembly component AC010327.8.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC008481.9 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC008481.9 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between AC024575.6 and AC010176.12 has been curated to include all of AC116609.6's/1K-Genomes decoy sequence.

issue.summary: Representation for additional LRC/KIR haplotypes in the reference assembly may be possible
issue.description: There are additional sequenced haplotypes for the LRC/KIR region that are being considered for inclusion in the assembly.
issue.resolution_text: KIR haplotypes GU182338.1 - GU182362.1 have been added to the Chromosome 19 ALT_REF_LOCI TPF's.

issue.summary: Potentially incorrect base in GRCh37 affecting RefSeq gene for CYP2S1
issue.description: Potentially incorrect base at nt 41,704,832 in NC_000019.9 affects RefSeq gene for CYP2S1.
issue.resolution_text: KC877736.1 has been inserted into the assembly to correct a reported error at GRCh37 NC_000019.9 nt 41,704,832. The base has been changed from A to G. This is located in an intron of the CYP2S1 gene, and corresponds to dbSNP id rs338592. The RefSeq gene has been updated to NG_007933.2 to match the corrected assembly sequence.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC217140.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC217140.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC217140.4 was added to the Chrom. 19 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC231987.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly

issue.summary: GRCh38 switch point update removed coding sequence from FCGBP
issue.description: A switch point update between assembly components AC011536.6 and AC007842.1 has disrupted the alignment of FCGBP (NM_003890.2).
issue.resolution_text: The correct alignment (Align ID: 32458) was marked 'preferred' in the overlap page for AC011536.6 and AC007842.1.

issue.summary: AC008739.5: different clone names in TPF files
issue.description: Two different local names for AC008739.5 appear in GRC TPF files. This has no effect on assembly sequence. The GRC will investigate and edit the files as needed.
issue.resolution_text: Chr. 19 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 component AC008739's clone name was changed from CITB-E1_2542C24 to CTD-2542C24.

issue.summary: AC245128.3: different clone names in TPF files
issue.description: Two different local names for AC245128.3 appear in GRC TPF files. This has no effect on assembly sequence. The GRC will investigate and edit the files as needed.
issue.resolution_text: The Chr. 19 ALT_REF_LOCI_24 TPF has been resubmitted with the correct clone name for AC245128.3 (CH17-24O14 to CH17-87E23).

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Reference contains inactivating allele of FUT3
issue.status_text: Determining whether or not the Reference should contain an active form of the FUT3 allele.
issue.description: The Reference contains the inactive form of FUT3.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC016586.9
issue.status_text: This issue is currently under review.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268196.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 19, suggest there may be ~3,751 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC016586.9. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC092279.2
issue.status_text: Currently discussing the feasibility of sequencing a new clone here with just Miseq data.
issue.description: NC_000019.10 (GRCh38) appears to have a ~2,610bp deletion at nt 24,082,678.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Contig Hschr19_ctg3_1 in the contig building report is failing
issue.status_text: Looking into a way to get the 3bp read alignment to stop failing.
issue.description: Contig Hschr19_ctg3_1 in the contig building report is failing in AC011478.3, between WGS sequences KF456548.1 and KF456549.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 66002 (CYP4F12), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There are discrepancies in the alignment of RefSeq NM_023944.2 (CYP4F12) to the reference genome sequence
issue.resolution_text: WGS sequence AEKP01137955.1 and mini-contig KF459712.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC004523.1 and improving the alignment of CYP4F12 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Hsa19- CAPN12/ECH1 problem region
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion between AC022144.8 and AC008982.5
issue.resolution_text: CH17-66M11 (AC256309.1) has been submitted and added to the Chr. 19 Primary TPF and the Chr. 19 Patches TPF, correcting an inversion in the Reference (NC_000019.8:38,773,736-38,788,983).

issue.summary: GeneID: 727787 (LOC727787), may be redundant
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113949 (component: AL133414.4) has an alignment to sequence on ref. chromosome 19.
issue.resolution_text: This is a duplicate ticket to the issue described in HG-196 (resolved). AL133414.4 will be removed from the Reference_unlocalized TPF for Chrom. 19 as data shows it is mis-assembled.

issue.summary: GeneID: 3805 (KIR2DL4), may be redundant
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113949 (component: AL133414.4) has an alignment to sequence on ref. chromosome 19.
issue.resolution_text: This is a duplicate ticket to the issue described in HG-196 (resolved). AL133414.4 will be removed from the Reference_unlocalized TPF for Chrom. 19 as data shows it is mis-assembled.

issue.summary: GeneID: 148206 (ZNF714), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_182515.2 (ZNF714) and the reference genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573658.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC012627.4 and improving the alignment of ZNF714 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 3809 (KIR2DS4), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_012314.3 (KIR2DS4) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: GU182338.1, an alternate haplotype of the KIR gene cluster, has been uploaded to the Chr. 19 ALT_REF_LOCI_26 TPF. This haplotype contains the 22-nt polymorphic indel.

issue.summary: GeneID: 8425 (LTBP4), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_003573.2 (LTBP4) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459702.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching an indel in AC010412.9 and correcting the alignment of LTBP4 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 10782 (ZNF274), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_133502.1 (ZNF274) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573653.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC020915.6 and improving the alignment of ZNF274 to the Reference.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_007253.3 (CYP4F8) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459713.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AD000685.1 and improving the alignment of CYP4F8 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 29128 (UHRF1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001048201.1 (UHRF1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459704.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC104525.4 and improving the alignment of UHRF1 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 56928 (SPPL2B), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_152988.2 (SPPL2B) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459714.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC004410.1 and improving the alignment of SPPL2B to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 84717 (HDGF2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_001001520.1 (HDGF2) and the reference genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573697.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC011498.7 and improving the alignment of HDGF2 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 84941 (HSH2D), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_032855.2 (HSH2D) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF495722.1 was added to GRCh38, patching AC020911.9 and correcting the alignment of HSH2D to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 126208 (ZNF787), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001002836.2 (ZNF787) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573663.1 was added to GRCh38, patching AC024580.6 and improving the alignment of ZNF787 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Blunt/short certification required for AC092364.3 and AC010617.8
issue.description: Possible blunt/short join between AC092364.3 and AC010617.8 requires certification evidence.
issue.resolution_text: Alignment uploaded to database.

issue.summary: GeneID: 388561 (ZNF761), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: AC022137.6 has a 1-nt insertion compared to NM_001008401.3
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF495723.1 was added to GRCh38, patching AC022137.6 and improving the alignment of ZNF761 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Chr. 19 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC125387.2 and AC126754.2
issue.resolution_text: AC119400.2 and AC238893.3 have been added to the Chr. 19 TPF, closing this gap. Also, the switchpoint between AC125387.2 and AC119400.2 has been curated, eliminating chimeric sequence in AC125387.2.

issue.summary: Chr. 19 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145203.1 and AC130468.2
issue.resolution_text: RP11-468O16 (AC243312.2) has been sequenced to close this gap, making AC130468.2, AC092312.3, AC092566.2 and AC093230.2 redundant.

issue.summary: Chr. 19 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: There is a gap between assembly components AC078899.1 and AC008554.8.
issue.resolution_text: An overlap was identified between components AC078899.1 and AC008554.8. The overlap closes the gap reported in this issue.

issue.summary: Potential sequence error on AC069278.1 affecting CEACAM20
issue.description: Discrepency between published cDNA and genomic sequence AC069278.1
issue.resolution_text: AC245748.2, part of a CH17 pathway in this region, has been uploaded and fixes this indel.

issue.summary: GeneID: 79744 (ZNF419), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Questionable identity of NC_000019.9 nt 58,003,580 affects positioning of intron/exon boundary in NM_024691.3 (GeneID: 79744 (ZNF419)).
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459703.1 was added to GRCh38, patching AC003005.1 and improving the alignment of ZNF419 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 55957 (LIN37), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Questionable identity of NC_000019.9 nt 36,243,813 affects positioning of intron/exon boundary in NM_019104.1 (GeneID: 55957 (LIN37)).
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KC877725.1 has been uploaded to the Chromosome 19 TPF, correcting the base (changed from 'G' to 'A').

issue.summary: Hsa19- LASS4 problem region
issue.status_text: RP11-177L8 has been selected for sequencing.
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion between AC022146.8 and AC010323.8
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 9757 (MLL4), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_014727.1:3058^3059 aligns as an intron with GT-CA splice sites
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF511267.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AD000671.1 and fixing the alignment of MLL4 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 90273 (CEACAM21), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_033543.3 spligns to GRCh37 with GT-TG splice sites at 975^976.
issue.resolution_text: The CHORI-17 TPF has been uploaded to the Chromosome 19 TPF and the Chromosome 19 patches TPF.

issue.summary: Possible missing sequence in assembly in region of component AC123912.1
issue.status_text: Determining how we plan to add this alternate allele/unique sequence to the Reference.
issue.description: Possible 50 kb sequence missing in GRCh37 in the vicinity of component AC123912.1
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 80164 (FLJ22184), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is an extra 'C' at NM_001190467.1:432 compared to GRCh37, at NC_000019.9:7938307..7938306
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459711.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching the indel in AC010336.8 and fixing the alignment of NM_001190467.1 to the Reference.
